tool_description: Prayer times for around the world by MuslimSalat.com
name: Muslim Salat
title: Muslim Salat

api_list.name: Prayer Times for a location

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Name of the location where user is at or his state name or his country name or with his latitude and longitude .

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://muslimsalat.p.rapidapi.com/london.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "muslimsalat.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://muslimsalat.p.rapidapi.com/{location}.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "muslimsalat.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Prayer Times
api_list.description: This will fetch the prayer time based on the location you request for with the given parameters. All following parameters are optional, you can set as you wish. If you wish to set two or more parameters, then you have to set url in the order the parameter is given below.

optional_parameters.name: times
optional_parameters.description: Limit the prayer times by the value. Daily, weekly, monthly or yearly

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Get the prayer times for the given date, please make sure the date is further head or current date. Heads up! Previous dates will be deprecated from the api.

optional_parameters.name: daylight
optional_parameters.description: Daylight saving for the user, if true then hours are incremented by 1+

optional_parameters.name: method
optional_parameters.description: Method to use for calculation of the timing. If method is provided invalid based on the country, it will give incorrect timing.   1 = Egyptian General Authority of Survey  2 = University Of Islamic Sciences, Karachi (Shafi)  3 = University Of Islamic Sciences, Karachi (Hanafi)  4 = Islamic Circle of North America  5 = Muslim World League  6 = Umm Al-Qura  7 = Fixed Isha

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Name of the location where user is at or his state name or his country name or with his latitude and longitude .
